snippet.title: Samurai Love Ballad: PARTY- Opening Movie
snippet.description:
In the war-torn Sengoku Era...
To save your brother's life, you go to serve at the castle.

But...who would await you there but the nation's strongest...
The samurai who would stop at nothing to rule Japan...! 

Though both of you know death is waiting...

"I swear to protect you...on my sword, and on my very life itself..."

His hidden charms pull you into a desperate love of warring hearts! 

Meet twelve brave samurai with their own passionate desires...

The love stories that will turn the tides of history...all start with you!

★Samurai Love Ballad: PARTY at the App Store★
https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/samurai-love-ballad-party/id1058354618?mt=8

★Samurai Love Ballad: PARTY at Google Play★
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.voltage.joshige.tenka.en&hl=ja
